blocks.name: itgsin0pilem1
blocks.content: Calculation of the integral for sine on the (0,π) interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgsin0pilem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wceq(citg(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))), nat2)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  3eqtri(citg(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))), nat2, co(cfv(c0, cpi), cmin, cfv(c0, nat0)), co(nat1, cmin, cneg(nat1)))
  eqtr3i(citg(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))), co(cfv(c0, cpi), cmin, cfv(c0, nat0)), citg(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(co(cr, cdv, c0), cv(s0))))
  mptru(wceq(citg(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(co(cr, cdv, c0), cv(s0))), citg(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0)))))
  itgeq2dv(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(co(cr, cdv, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(csin, cv(s0)), wtru)
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wceq(cfv(co(cr, cdv, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(csin, cv(s0))))
  syl5eq(cfv(co(cr, cdv, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)))
  fveq1i(co(cr, cdv, c0), cv(s0), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))))
  mpdan(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))), cv(s0)), cfv(csin, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cc))
  sincld(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)))
  sseli(cv(s0), co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cc)
  fvmpt2(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cc, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))))
  mptru(wceq(citg(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(co(cr, cdv, c0), cv(s0))), co(cfv(c0, cpi), cmin, cfv(c0, nat0))))
  ftc2(s0, nat0, cpi, c0, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(nat0, cr))
  a1i(wtru, wcel(cpi, cr))
  a1i(wtru, wbr(nat0, cle, cpi))
  syl5eqel(co(cr, cdv, c0), co(co(nat0, cioo, cpi), ccncf, cc), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))), wtru)
  cncfmptss(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), csin, cc, cc, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wss(co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cc))
  sstri(co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cc, cr)
  syl5eqel(co(cr, cdv, c0), cibl, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))), wtru)
  3eqtri(co(cr, cdv, c0), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))), co(cr, cdv, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0))))), co(cr, cdv, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0))))))
  oveq2i(cr, cdv, c0, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))))
  mptru(wceq(co(cr, cdv, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0))))), co(cr, cdv, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))))))
  dvmptntr(s0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0))), co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wss(cr, cc))
  a1i(wtru, wss(co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cr))
  negcld(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)), wa(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, cpi))))
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, cpi)), wcel(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)), cc))
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cfv(cnt, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), co(nat0, cicc, cpi)), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)))
  mp2an(wceq(cfv(cfv(cnt, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), co(nat0, cicc, cpi)), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(cpi, cr))
  iccntr(nat0, cpi)
  mptru(wceq(co(cr, cdv, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0))))), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0)))))
  dvmptres(s0, cr, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0))), cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cr, cc, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), wtru)
  negcld(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)), wa(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cc))
  syl6eq(co(cr, cdv, cmpt(s0, cr, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0))))), cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(csin, cv(s0))), cmpt(s0, cr, cneg(cneg(cfv(csin, cv(s0))))), wtru)
  dvmptneg(s0, cr, cr, cfv(ccos, cv(s0)), cneg(cfv(csin, cv(s0))), cc, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(cr, cpr(cr, cc)))
  reelprrecn()
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)), cc))
  coscld(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cneg(cfv(csin, cv(s0))), cc))
  negcld(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  a1i(wtru, wceq(co(cr, cdv, cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))), cmpt(s0, cr, cneg(cfv(csin, cv(s0))))))
  dvcosre(s0)
  mpteq2ia(s0, cr, cneg(cneg(cfv(csin, cv(s0)))), cfv(csin, cv(s0)))
  negnegd(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  sincld(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  recn(cv(s0))
  a1i(wtru, wss(co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cr))
  ioossre(nat0, cpi)
  tgioo2(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  a1i(wtru, wcel(co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  iooretop(nat0, cpi)
  iblss(s0, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0)), co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cc, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wss(co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(nat0, cicc, cpi)))
  ioossicc(nat0, cpi)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cdm(cvol)))
  ioombl(nat0, cpi)
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, cpi)), wcel(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cc))
  sincld(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, cpi)))
  a1i(wtru, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))), cibl))
  mp3an(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))), cibl), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(cpi, cr), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))), co(co(nat0, cicc, cpi), ccncf, cc)))
  mptru(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))), co(co(nat0, cicc, cpi), ccncf, cc)))
  cncfmptss(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), csin, cc, cc, wtru)
  nfcv(s0, csin)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(csin, co(cc, ccncf, cc)))
  sincn()
  cniccibl(nat0, cpi, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s0))))
  a1i(wtru, wcel(c0, co(co(nat0, cicc, cpi), ccncf, cc)))
  eqeltri(c0, co(co(nat0, cicc, cpi), ccncf, cc), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))))
  eqtri(c0, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))), cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s1)))))
  cbvmptv(s1, s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s1))), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0))))
  negeqd(cfv(ccos, cv(s1)), cfv(ccos, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(s1), cv(s0), ccos)
  eqeltri(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))), co(co(nat0, cicc, cpi), ccncf, cc), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cfv(cmpt(s0, cc, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))), cv(s0))))
  mpteq2ia(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0))), cfv(cmpt(s0, cc, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))), cv(s0)))
  eqcomd(cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0))), cfv(cmpt(s0, cc, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, cpi)))
  syl2anc(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, cpi)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cc, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))), cv(s0)), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0))), cc))
  negcld(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, cpi)))
  coscld(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, cpi)))
  sseli(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cc)
  fvmpt2(s0, cc, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0))), cc, cmpt(s0, cc, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))))
  mptru(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cfv(cmpt(s0, cc, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))), cv(s0))), co(co(nat0, cicc, cpi), ccncf, cc)))
  cncfmptss(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cmpt(s0, cc, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))), cc, cc, wtru)
  nfmpt1(s0, cc, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0))))
  a1i(wtru, wcel(cmpt(s0, cc, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))), co(cc, ccncf, cc)))
  ax-mp(wcel(cmpt(s0, cc, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))), co(cc, ccncf, cc)), wcel(ccos, co(cc, ccncf, cc)))
  coscn()
  negfcncf(s0, ccos, cc, cmpt(s0, cc, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cc, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))))
  a1i(wtru, wss(co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cc))
  sstri(co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cc, cr)
  mp2an(wss(co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cr), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(cpi, cr))
  iccssre(nat0, cpi)
  ax-resscn()
  oveq12i(cfv(c0, cpi), cmin, cfv(c0, nat0), nat1, cneg(nat1))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(c0, cpi), nat1), wcel(cpi, co(nat0, cicc, cpi)))
  mp3an(wcel(cpi, co(nat0, cicc, cpi)), wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(cpi, cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, cpi))
  ubicc2(nat0, cpi)
  fvmpt(s1, cpi, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), c0, nat1, cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s1))))
  eqtrd(cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s1))), nat1, cneg(cneg(nat1)), wceq(cv(s1), cpi))
  negeqd(cfv(ccos, cv(s1)), cneg(nat1), wceq(cv(s1), cpi))
  syl6eq(cfv(ccos, cv(s1)), cneg(nat1), cfv(ccos, cpi), wceq(cv(s1), cpi))
  fveq2(cv(s1), cpi, ccos)
  cospi()
  negnegd(nat1, wceq(cv(s1), cpi))
  a1i(wceq(cv(s1), cpi), wcel(nat1, cc))
  1ex()
  eqtri(cfv(c0, nat0), cneg(nat1), cneg(cfv(ccos, nat0)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cneg(cfv(ccos, nat0))), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi)))
  mp3an(wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi)), wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(cpi, cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, cpi))
  0xr()
  rexri(cpi)
  ltleii(nat0, cpi)
  0re()
  pire()
  pipos()
  lbicc2(nat0, cpi)
  fvmpt(s1, nat0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), c0, cneg(cfv(ccos, nat0)), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(s1))))
  negeqd(cfv(ccos, cv(s1)), cfv(ccos, nat0), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))
  fveq2(cv(s1), nat0, ccos)
  negex(cfv(ccos, nat0))
  negeqi(cfv(ccos, nat0), nat1)
  cos0()
  eqtri(co(nat1, cmin, cneg(nat1)), nat2, co(nat1, caddc, nat1))
  subnegi(nat1, nat1)
  ax-1cn()
  1p1e2()
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cicc, cpi)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ccos, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpi)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, cfv(ccos, cv(s1)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccos, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cioo, cpi)
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cpi.s(s0)
  diff.csin.s(s0)
  diff.ccos.s(s0)
  diff.cpi.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, cfv(ccos, nat0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ccos, nat0)
  diff.ccos.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
}

thm itgsin0pilem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ S.((0[(,)]π),(sin ` s0), s0)= 2
  ⊣ c0 =(s1 ∈(0[[,]]π)↦ -u((cos ` s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  3eqtri(S.((0[(,)]π),(sin ` s0), s0), nat2, ((c0 ` π)[-](c0 ` 0)), (1[-]-u(1)))
  eqtr3i(S.((0[(,)]π),(sin ` s0), s0), ((c0 ` π)[-](c0 ` 0)), S.((0[(,)]π),((ℝ[_D]c0)` s0), s0))
  mptru(S.((0[(,)]π),((ℝ[_D]c0)` s0), s0)= S.((0[(,)]π),(sin ` s0), s0))
  itgeq2dv(s0, (0[(,)]π), ((ℝ[_D]c0)` s0), (sin ` s0), wtru)
  adantl(wtru, s0 ∈(0[(,)]π), ((ℝ[_D]c0)` s0)=(sin ` s0))
  syl5eq(((ℝ[_D]c0)` s0), (sin ` s0), ((s0 ∈(0[(,)]π)↦(sin ` s0))` s0), s0 ∈(0[(,)]π))
  fveq1i((ℝ[_D]c0), s0, (s0 ∈(0[(,)]π)↦(sin ` s0)))
  mpdan(s0 ∈(0[(,)]π), ((s0 ∈(0[(,)]π)↦(sin ` s0))` s0)=(sin ` s0), (sin ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  sincld(s0, s0 ∈(0[(,)]π))
  sseli(s0, (0[(,)]π), cc)
  fvmpt2(s0, (0[(,)]π), (sin ` s0), cc, (s0 ∈(0[(,)]π)↦(sin ` s0)))
  eqid((s0 ∈(0[(,)]π)↦(sin ` s0)))
  mptru(S.((0[(,)]π),((ℝ[_D]c0)` s0), s0)=((c0 ` π)[-](c0 ` 0)))
  ftc2(s0, nat0, cpi, c0, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, 0 ∈ ℝ)
  a1i(wtru, π ∈ ℝ)
  a1i(wtru, 0[≤]π)
  syl5eqel((ℝ[_D]c0), ((0[(,)]π)[-cn->]ℂ), (s0 ∈(0[(,)]π)↦(sin ` s0)), wtru)
  cncfmptss(s0, (0[(,)]π), csin, cc, cc, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, (0[(,)]π)⊆ ℂ)
  sstri((0[(,)]π), cc, cr)
  syl5eqel((ℝ[_D]c0), cibl, (s0 ∈(0[(,)]π)↦(sin ` s0)), wtru)
  3eqtri((ℝ[_D]c0), (s0 ∈(0[(,)]π)↦(sin ` s0)), (ℝ[_D](s0 ∈(0[[,]]π)↦ -u((cos ` s0)))), (ℝ[_D](s0 ∈(0[(,)]π)↦ -u((cos ` s0)))))
  oveq2i(cr, cdv, c0, (s0 ∈(0[[,]]π)↦ -u((cos ` s0))))
  mptru((ℝ[_D](s0 ∈(0[[,]]π)↦ -u((cos ` s0))))=(ℝ[_D](s0 ∈(0[(,)]π)↦ -u((cos ` s0)))))
  dvmptntr(s0, cr, (0[[,]]π), -u((cos ` s0)), (0[(,)]π), (topGen ` ran((,))), (TopOpen ` CCfld), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, ℝ ⊆ ℂ)
  a1i(wtru, (0[[,]]π)⊆ ℝ)
  negcld((cos ` s0), (T ∧ s0 ∈(0[[,]]π)))
  adantl(wtru, s0 ∈(0[[,]]π), (cos ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  a1i(wtru, ((int `(topGen ` ran((,))))`(0[[,]]π))=(0[(,)]π))
  mp2an(((int `(topGen ` ran((,))))`(0[[,]]π))=(0[(,)]π), 0 ∈ ℝ, π ∈ ℝ)
  iccntr(nat0, cpi)
  mptru((ℝ[_D](s0 ∈(0[(,)]π)↦ -u((cos ` s0))))=(s0 ∈(0[(,)]π)↦(sin ` s0)))
  dvmptres(s0, cr, (0[(,)]π), -u((cos ` s0)), (sin ` s0), cr, cc, (topGen ` ran((,))), (TopOpen ` CCfld), wtru)
  negcld((cos ` s0), (T ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ))
  adantl(wtru, s0 ∈ ℝ, (sin ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  syl6eq((ℝ[_D](s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ -u((cos ` s0)))), (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦(sin ` s0)), (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ -u(-u((sin ` s0)))), wtru)
  dvmptneg(s0, cr, cr, (cos ` s0), -u((sin ` s0)), cc, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, ℝ ∈ { ℝ, ℂ })
  reelprrecn()
  adantl(wtru, s0 ∈ ℝ, (cos ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  coscld(s0, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  adantl(wtru, s0 ∈ ℝ, -u((sin ` s0))∈ ℂ)
  negcld((sin ` s0), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  a1i(wtru, (ℝ[_D](s0 ∈ ℝ ↦(cos ` s0)))=(s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ -u((sin ` s0))))
  dvcosre(s0)
  mpteq2ia(s0, cr, -u(-u((sin ` s0))), (sin ` s0))
  negnegd((sin ` s0), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  sincld(s0, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  recn(s0)
  a1i(wtru, (0[(,)]π)⊆ ℝ)
  ioossre(nat0, cpi)
  tgioo2((TopOpen ` CCfld))
  eqid((TopOpen ` CCfld))
  a1i(wtru, (0[(,)]π)∈(topGen ` ran((,))))
  iooretop(nat0, cpi)
  iblss(s0, (0[(,)]π), (sin ` s0), (0[[,]]π), cc, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, (0[(,)]π)⊆(0[[,]]π))
  ioossicc(nat0, cpi)
  a1i(wtru, (0[(,)]π)∈ dom(vol))
  ioombl(nat0, cpi)
  adantl(wtru, s0 ∈(0[[,]]π), (sin ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  sincld(s0, s0 ∈(0[[,]]π))
  a1i(wtru, (s0 ∈(0[[,]]π)↦(sin ` s0))∈ L^1)
  mp3an((s0 ∈(0[[,]]π)↦(sin ` s0))∈ L^1, 0 ∈ ℝ, π ∈ ℝ, (s0 ∈(0[[,]]π)↦(sin ` s0))∈((0[[,]]π)[-cn->]ℂ))
  mptru((s0 ∈(0[[,]]π)↦(sin ` s0))∈((0[[,]]π)[-cn->]ℂ))
  cncfmptss(s0, (0[[,]]π), csin, cc, cc, wtru)
  nfcv(s0, csin)

thm ibliccsinexp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  mpteq2dva(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), co(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cexp, c2), cfv(cmpt(s0, cc, co(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cexp, c2)), cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  eqcomd(co(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cexp, c2), cfv(cmpt(s0, cc, co(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cexp, c2)), cv(s0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cicc, c1))))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cicc, c1))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cc, co(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cexp, c2)), cv(s0)), co(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cexp, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(co(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cexp, c2), cc))

  simpl3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cicc, c1)))

  cncfmptss(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), cmpt(s0, cc, co(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cexp, c2)), cc, cc, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  nfmpt1(s0, cc, co(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cexp, c2))
  expcnfg(s0, cc, csin, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cn0)))

  eqcomd(((sin ` s0)[^]c2), ((s0 ∈ ℂ ↦((sin ` s0)[^]c2))` s0), ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0)∧ s0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0)∧ s0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)), ((s0 ∈ ℂ ↦((sin ` s0)[^]c2))` s0)=((sin ` s0)[^]c2), s0 ∈ ℂ, ((sin ` s0)[^]c2)∈ ℂ)
  expcld((sin ` s0), c2, ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0)∧ s0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)))
  sincld(s0, ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0)∧ s0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)))
  3adantl3(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℕ0, s0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1), s0 ∈ ℂ)
  sselda(s0, (c0[[,]]c1), cc, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ))
  simpl3(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℕ0, s0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1))
  fvmpt2(s0, cc, ((sin ` s0)[^]c2), cc, (s0 ∈ ℂ ↦((sin ` s0)[^]c2)))
  eqid((s0 ∈ ℂ ↦((sin ` s0)[^]c2)))
  cncfmptss(s0, (c0[[,]]c1), (s0 ∈ ℂ ↦((sin ` s0)[^]c2)), cc, cc, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  nfmpt1(s0, cc, ((sin ` s0)[^]c2))
  expcnfg(s0, cc, csin, c2, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  nfcv(s0, csin)
  a1i((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0), sin ∈(ℂ[-cn->]ℂ))
  sincn()
  simp3(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℕ0)

thm itgsin0pi(setvar s0) {

} = {
  itgsin0pilem1(s0, hs0, cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(hs0)))))

  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs0, co(nat0, cicc, cpi), cneg(cfv(ccos, cv(hs0))))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpi)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpi.s(s0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, cfv(ccos, cv(hs0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccos, cv(hs0))
  diff.ccos.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm iblioosinexp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), co(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), cexp, c2)), cibl))

  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cn0)), wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  ioossicc(c0, c1)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(co(c0, cioo, c1), cdm(cvol)))
  ioombl(c0, c1)
  expcld(cfv(csin, cv(s0)), c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cicc, c1))))
  sincld(cv(s0), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cicc, c1))))
  3adantl3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  sselda(cv(s0), co(c0, cicc, c1), cc, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl6ss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cc, cr, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  iccssre(c0, c1)
  ax-resscn()
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cicc, c1)))

blocks.name: itgsinexp
blocks.content: A recursive formula for the integral of sin^N on the interval (0,π) . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)

blocks.name: iblconstmpt
blocks.content: A constant function is integrable. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: itgeq1d
blocks.content: Equality theorem for an integral. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: mbfres2cn
blocks.content: Measurability of a piecewise function: if ` F ` is measurable on subsets ` B ` and ` C ` of its domain, and these pieces make up all of ` A ` , then ` F ` is measurable on the whole domain. Similar to ~ mbfres2 but here the theorem is extended to complex-valued functions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm mbfres2cn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cres(c0, c2), cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cres(c0, c3), cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cun(c2, c3), c1))
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(ccom(cre, c0), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cim, c0), cmbf))
  mbfres2(ccom(cre, c0), c1, c2, c3, w0)
  sylancr(w0, wf(ccom(cre, c0), c1, cr), wf(cre, cc, cr), wf(c0, c1, cc))
  ref()
  fco(cre, cc, cr, c0, c1)
  syl5eqel(cres(ccom(cre, c0), c2), cmbf, ccom(cre, cres(c0, c2)), w0)
  resco(cre, c0, c2)
  simpld(w0, wcel(ccom(cre, cres(c0, c2)), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cim, cres(c0, c2)), cmbf))
  syl5eqel(cres(ccom(cre, c0), c3), cmbf, ccom(cre, cres(c0, c3)), w0)
  resco(cre, c0, c3)
  simpld(w0, wcel(ccom(cre, cres(c0, c3)), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cim, cres(c0, c3)), cmbf))
  mbfres2(ccom(cim, c0), c1, c2, c3, w0)
  sylancr(w0, wf(ccom(cim, c0), c1, cr), wf(cim, cc, cr), wf(c0, c1, cc))
  imf()
  fco(cim, cc, cr, c0, c1)
  syl5eqel(cres(ccom(cim, c0), c2), cmbf, ccom(cim, cres(c0, c2)), w0)
  resco(cim, c0, c2)
  simprd(w0, wcel(ccom(cim, cres(c0, c2)), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cre, cres(c0, c2)), cmbf))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(ccom(cre, cres(c0, c2)), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cim, cres(c0, c2)), cmbf)), wcel(cres(c0, c2), cmbf))
  3syl(w0, wb(wcel(cres(c0, c2), cmbf), wa(wcel(ccom(cre, cres(c0, c2)), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cim, cres(c0, c2)), cmbf))), wf(c0, c1, cc), wf(cres(c0, c2), cin(c1, c2), cc))
  fresin(c0, c1, cc, c2)
  ismbfcn(cres(c0, c2), cin(c1, c2))
  syl5eqel(cres(ccom(cim, c0), c3), cmbf, ccom(cim, cres(c0, c3)), w0)
  resco(cim, c0, c3)
  simprd(w0, wcel(ccom(cim, cres(c0, c3)), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cre, cres(c0, c3)), cmbf))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(ccom(cre, cres(c0, c3)), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cim, cres(c0, c3)), cmbf)), wcel(cres(c0, c3), cmbf))
  3syl(w0, wb(wcel(cres(c0, c3), cmbf), wa(wcel(ccom(cre, cres(c0, c3)), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cim, cres(c0, c3)), cmbf))), wf(c0, c1, cc), wf(cres(c0, c3), cin(c1, c3), cc))
  fresin(c0, c1, cc, c3)
  ismbfcn(cres(c0, c3), cin(c1, c3))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cmbf), wa(wcel(ccom(cre, c0), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cim, c0), cmbf))), wf(c0, c1, cc))
  ismbfcn(c0, c1)
}

thm mbfres2cn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 |` c2)∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 |` c3)∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 ⋃ c3)= c1)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, c0 ∈ MblFn, (Re ∘ c0)∈ MblFn, (Im ∘ c0)∈ MblFn)
  mbfres2((Re ∘ c0), c1, c2, c3, w0)
  sylancr(w0, ((Re ∘ c0): c1 → ℝ), (Re : ℂ → ℝ), (c0 : c1 → ℂ))
  ref()
  fco(cre, cc, cr, c0, c1)
  syl5eqel(((Re ∘ c0)|` c2), cmbf, (Re ∘(c0 |` c2)), w0)
  resco(cre, c0, c2)
  simpld(w0, (Re ∘(c0 |` c2))∈ MblFn, (Im ∘(c0 |` c2))∈ MblFn)
  syl5eqel(((Re ∘ c0)|` c3), cmbf, (Re ∘(c0 |` c3)), w0)
  resco(cre, c0, c3)
  simpld(w0, (Re ∘(c0 |` c3))∈ MblFn, (Im ∘(c0 |` c3))∈ MblFn)
  mbfres2((Im ∘ c0), c1, c2, c3, w0)
  sylancr(w0, ((Im ∘ c0): c1 → ℝ), (Im : ℂ → ℝ), (c0 : c1 → ℂ))
  imf()
  fco(cim, cc, cr, c0, c1)
  syl5eqel(((Im ∘ c0)|` c2), cmbf, (Im ∘(c0 |` c2)), w0)
  resco(cim, c0, c2)
  simprd(w0, (Im ∘(c0 |` c2))∈ MblFn, (Re ∘(c0 |` c2))∈ MblFn)
  mpbid(w0, ((Re ∘(c0 |` c2))∈ MblFn ∧(Im ∘(c0 |` c2))∈ MblFn), (c0 |` c2)∈ MblFn)
  3syl(w0, ((c0 |` c2)∈ MblFn ↔((Re ∘(c0 |` c2))∈ MblFn ∧(Im ∘(c0 |` c2))∈ MblFn)), (c0 : c1 → ℂ), ((c0 |` c2):(c1 ⋂ c2)→ ℂ))
  fresin(c0, c1, cc, c2)
  ismbfcn((c0 |` c2), (c1 ⋂ c2))
  syl5eqel(((Im ∘ c0)|` c3), cmbf, (Im ∘(c0 |` c3)), w0)
  resco(cim, c0, c3)
  simprd(w0, (Im ∘(c0 |` c3))∈ MblFn, (Re ∘(c0 |` c3))∈ MblFn)
  mpbid(w0, ((Re ∘(c0 |` c3))∈ MblFn ∧(Im ∘(c0 |` c3))∈ MblFn), (c0 |` c3)∈ MblFn)
  3syl(w0, ((c0 |` c3)∈ MblFn ↔((Re ∘(c0 |` c3))∈ MblFn ∧(Im ∘(c0 |` c3))∈ MblFn)), (c0 : c1 → ℂ), ((c0 |` c3):(c1 ⋂ c3)→ ℂ))
  fresin(c0, c1, cc, c3)
  ismbfcn((c0 |` c3), (c1 ⋂ c3))
  syl(w0, (c0 ∈ MblFn ↔((Re ∘ c0)∈ MblFn ∧(Im ∘ c0)∈ MblFn)), (c0 : c1 → ℂ))
  ismbfcn(c0, c1)
}

} = {

  eqtrd(cif(c4, cif(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cif(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cioo, c1))))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), co(c0, cioo, c1), c2, cr, w0)
  fvmpt2(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), cif(c4, cif(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), cr, c3)

  neneqd(cv(s0), c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cioo, c1))))

  iffalsed(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cioo, c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c1))

blocks.name: cnbdibl
blocks.content: A continuous bounded function is integrable. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnbdibl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cibl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cvol, c1), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, ccncf, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(c0, cibl), wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccncf, cc)))
  cnmbf(c1, c0)
  eqeltrd(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr, cfv(cvol, c1), w0)
  fveq2d(cvol, cdm(c0), c1, w0)
  3syl(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccncf, cc)), wf(c0, c1, cc))
  cncff(c0, c1, cc)
  fdm(c0, c1, cc)
  bddibl(s0, s1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnbdibl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ L^1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ dom(vol))
  ⊣ (w0 →(vol ` c1)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[-cn->]ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, c0 ∈ L^1, c0 ∈ MblFn, (vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0)))
  syl2anc(w0, c0 ∈ MblFn, c1 ∈ dom(vol), c0 ∈(c1[-cn->]ℂ))
  cnmbf(c1, c0)
  eqeltrd((vol ` dom(c0)), cr, (vol ` c1), w0)
  fveq2d(cvol, dom(c0), c1, w0)
  3syl(w0, dom(c0)= c1, c0 ∈(c1[-cn->]ℂ), (c0 : c1 → ℂ))
  cncff(c0, c1, cc)
  fdm(c0, c1, cc)
  bddibl(s0, s1, c0)
}

  itgeq2dv(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2, c3, w0)
  syl5req(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c3), cdit(s0, c0, c1, c3), cif(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c3), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c0), c3)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), w0)

  a1i(wa(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wceq(nat0, cif(cfv(cre, co(nat0, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs1)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(nat0, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs1)))))))))

  diff.hs1.c(nat0)

thm iblsplit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c2, c3)), nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cun(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cibl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c3, c1), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cr)))
  mbfres2cn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2, c3, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, cc, w0)
  eqeltrd(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), cmbf, cmpt(s0, c2, c1), w0)
  resmptd(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eqeltrd(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c3), cmbf, cmpt(s0, c3, c1), w0)
  resmptd(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  eqcomd(cun(c2, c3), c0, w0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cr))
  eqeltrd(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cr, co(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), caddc, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, nat3))))
  itg2split(s0, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c2, c3, c0, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, nat3))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, nat3)), wcel(c2, cdm(cvol)))

blocks.name: volsn
blocks.content: A singleton has 0 Lebesgue measure. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: itgvol0
blocks.content: If the domani is negligible, the function is integrable and the integral is 0. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

  mpbii(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, emptycls, c1), cibl))

  mpt0(s0, c1)

  itg0(s0, c1)
  simprd(w0, wceq(citg(s0, emptycls, c1), citg(s0, c0, c1)), wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, emptycls, c1), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl)))

  a1i(w0, wss(emptycls, c0))

}

thm itgvol0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1 ∧ S.(c0, c1, s0)= 0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(vol* ` c0)= 0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1, S.(c0, c1, s0)= 0)
  mpbii(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1, (s0 ∈ ∅ ↦ c1)∈ L^1)
  eqeltri((s0 ∈ ∅ ↦ c1), cibl, emptycls)
  mpt0(s0, c1)
  iblempty()
  simpld(w0, ((s0 ∈ ∅ ↦ c1)∈ L^1 ↔(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1), S.(∅, c1, s0)= S.(c0, c1, s0))
  syl5reqr(S.(c0, c1, s0), nat0, S.(∅, c1, s0), w0)
  itg0(s0, c1)
  simprd(w0, S.(∅, c1, s0)= S.(c0, c1, s0), ((s0 ∈ ∅ ↦ c1)∈ L^1 ↔(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1))
  itgss3(s0, emptycls, c1, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, ∅ ⊆ c0)
  0ss(c0)
  syl3anc(w0, (vol* `(c0 \ ∅))= 0, (c0 \ ∅)⊆ c0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` c0)= 0)
  difssd(c0, emptycls, w0)
  ovolssnul((c0 \ ∅), c0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: iblsplitf
blocks.content: A version of ~ iblsplit using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions" (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm iblsplitf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c2, c3)), nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cun(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cibl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c3, c1), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl5eqel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl, cmpt(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), w0)
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  iblsplit(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cc)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cc))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cc))
  rspcsbela(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1, cc)
  syl5eqel(cmpt(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cibl, cmpt(s0, c2, c1), w0)
  cbvmpt(hs0, s0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c1)
  syl5eqel(cmpt(hs0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cibl, cmpt(s0, c3, c1), w0)
  cbvmpt(hs0, s0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  eqcomd(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  equcoms(hs0, s0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iblsplitf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 →(vol* `(c2 ⋂ c3))= 0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(c2 ⋃ c3))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)∈ L^1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c1)∈ L^1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl5eqel((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), cibl, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦[hs0 / s0]c1), w0)
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  iblsplit(hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℂ))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  ralrimi(s0, c0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ ℂ)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  ex((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  rspcsbela(s0, hs0, c0, c1, cc)
  syl5eqel((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦[hs0 / s0]c1), cibl, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1), w0)
  cbvmpt(hs0, s0, c2, [hs0 / s0]c1, c1)
  syl5eqel((hs0 ∈ c3 ↦[hs0 / s0]c1), cibl, (s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c1), w0)
  cbvmpt(hs0, s0, c3, [hs0 / s0]c1, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  eqcomd([hs0 / s0]c1, c1, hs0 = s0)
  equcoms(hs0, s0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ibliooicc

  ssid(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)))

  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(c0, cxr))

blocks.name: iblspltprt
blocks.content: If a function is integrable on any interval of a partition, then it is integrable on the whole interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: itgsubsticc
blocks.content: Integration by u-substitution. The main difference with respect to ~ itgsubst is that here we consider the range of ` A ( x ) ` to be in the closed interval ` ( K [,] L ) ` . If ` A ( x ) ` is a continuous, differentiable function from ` [ X , Y ] ` to ` ( Z , W ) ` , whose derivative is continuous and integrable, and ` C ( u ) ` is a continuous function on ` ( Z , W ) ` , then the integral of ` C ( u ) ` from ` K = A ( X ) ` to ` L = A ( Y ) ` is equal to the integral of ` C ( A ( x ) ) _D A ( x ) ` from ` X ` to ` Y ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(cr, cdv, cmpt(s1, co(c3, cicc, c4), c7)), cmpt(s1, co(c3, cioo, c4), c6)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c7), wceq(c2, c5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c3), wceq(c7, c0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c4), wceq(c7, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

blocks.name: itgioocnicc
blocks.content: The integral of a piecewise continuous function ` F ` on an open interval is equal to the integral of the continuous function ` G ` , in the corresponding closed interval. ` G ` is equal to ` F ` on the open interval, but it is continuous at the two boundaries, also. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: iblcncfioo
blocks.content: A continuous function ` F ` on an open interval ` ( A (,) B ) ` with a finite right limit ` R ` in ` A ` and a finite left limit ` L ` in ` B ` is integrable. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm iblcncfioo(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cibl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(co(c1, cioo, c2), ccncf, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(c0, climc, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, co(c0, climc, c1)))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c0, cibl, cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cioo, c2), cif(c4, cif(c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), w0)
  eqtrd(c0, cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cioo, c2), cif(c4, cif(c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cioo, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), w0)
  feqmptd(hs0, c0, co(c1, cioo, c2), cc, w0)
  mpteq2dva(hs0, co(c1, cioo, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cif(c4, cif(c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), w0)
  eqcomd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cif(c4, cif(c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cioo, c2))))
  iblss(hs0, co(c1, cioo, c2), cif(c4, cif(c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), co(c1, cicc, c2), cc, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(co(c1, cioo, c2), co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  ioossicc(c1, c2)
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(c1, cioo, c2), cdm(cvol)))
  ioombl(c1, c2)

blocks.name: itgiccshift
blocks.content: The integral of a function, ` F ` stays the same if its closed interval domain is shifted by ` T ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgiccshift(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cicc, co(c2, caddc, c1)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), citg(s0, co(c0, cicc, c2), cfv(c4, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, co(co(c0, cicc, c2), ccncf, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cicc, co(c2, caddc, c1)), cfv(c4, co(cv(s0), cmin, c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

blocks.name: itgperiod
blocks.content: The integral of a periodic function, with period ` T ` stays the same if the domain of integration is shifted. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: sublevolico
blocks.content: The Lebesgue measure of a left-closed, right-open interval is greater than or equal to the difference of the two bounds. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm sublevolico(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), cle, cfv(cvol, co(c1, cico, c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), cle, cfv(cvol, co(c1, cico, c0))), wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  breqtrd(co(c0, cmin, c1), cle, cfv(cvol, co(c1, cico, c0)), co(c0, cmin, c1), wa(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), cle, co(c0, cmin, c1)))
  eqled(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c0, cmin, c1), w0)
  resubcld(c0, c1, w0)
  eqidd(co(c0, cmin, c1), w0)
  eqtr2d(co(c0, cmin, c1), cfv(cvol, co(c1, cico, c0)), cif(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0, wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wa(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0), wceq(cfv(cvol, co(c1, cico, c0)), cif(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0, wbr(c1, clt, c0))))
  adantl(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0), wceq(cif(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0, wbr(c1, clt, c0)), co(c0, cmin, c1)))
  iftrue(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0, wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  breqtrd(co(c0, cmin, c1), cle, cfv(cvol, co(c1, cico, c0)), nat0, wa(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0))), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), cle, nat0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0))), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  simpr(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0))))
  lenltd(c0, c1, w0)
  suble0d(c0, c1, wa(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wcel(c0, cr))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  eqtr2d(nat0, cfv(cvol, co(c1, cico, c0)), cif(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0, wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wa(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wceq(cfv(cvol, co(c1, cico, c0)), cif(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0, wbr(c1, clt, c0))))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(cvol, co(c1, cico, c0)), cif(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0, wbr(c1, clt, c0))), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  volico(c1, c0)
  adantl(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wceq(cif(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0, wbr(c1, clt, c0)), nat0))
  iffalse(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0, wbr(c1, clt, c0))
}

  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cr)), wn(wcel(cfv(covol, cv(s0)), cr)), wcel(cfv(covol, cv(s0)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

blocks.name: volioof
blocks.content: The function that assigns the Lebesgue measure to open intervals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm volioof() {
  |- wf(ccom(cvol, cioo), cxp(cxr, cxr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
} = {
  mp2an(wf(ccom(cvol, cioo), cxp(cxr, cxr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(cvol, cdm(cvol), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cdm(cvol)))
  volf()
  mpbir(wf(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cdm(cvol)), wa(wfn(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr)), wral(hs0, cxp(cxr, cxr), wcel(cfv(cioo, cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol)))))
  pm3.2i(wfn(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr)), wral(hs0, cxp(cxr, cxr), wcel(cfv(cioo, cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol))))
  ax-mp(wfn(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr)), wf(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cr)))
  ioof()
  ffn(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cr))
  rgen(hs0, cxp(cxr, cxr), wcel(cfv(cioo, cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol)))
  syl6eqel(cfv(cioo, cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol), co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cioo, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  eqtr2d(cfv(cioo, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cioo, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), cfv(cioo, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cxr, cxr)), wceq(co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cioo, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), cfv(cioo, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))))))
  df-ov(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cioo, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))
  fveq2d(cioo, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  eqcomd(cop(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  1st2nd2(cv(hs0), cxr, cxr)
  ioombl(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))
  ffnfv(hs0, cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cdm(cvol))
  fco(cvol, cdm(cvol), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr))
  diff.hs0.c(cioo)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(cxr, cxr))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(cvol))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm volioof() {
  ⊢ ((vol ∘(,)):(ℝ* × ℝ*)→(0[[,]]+∞))
} = {
  mp2an(((vol ∘(,)):(ℝ* × ℝ*)→(0[[,]]+∞)), (vol : dom(vol)→(0[[,]]+∞)), ((,):(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ dom(vol)))
  volf()
  mpbir(((,):(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ dom(vol)), ((,)[Fn](ℝ* × ℝ*)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(ℝ* × ℝ*),((,)` hs0)∈ dom(vol))))
  pm3.2i((,)[Fn](ℝ* × ℝ*), ∀(hs0 ∈(ℝ* × ℝ*),((,)` hs0)∈ dom(vol)))
  ax-mp((,)[Fn](ℝ* × ℝ*), ((,):(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ)))
  ioof()
  ffn(cioo, (ℝ* × ℝ*), P(ℝ))
  rgen(hs0, (ℝ* × ℝ*), ((,)` hs0)∈ dom(vol))
  syl6eqel(((,)` hs0), dom(vol), ((1st ` hs0)[(,)](2nd ` hs0)), hs0 ∈(ℝ* × ℝ*))
  eqtr2d(((,)` hs0), ((1st ` hs0)[(,)](2nd ` hs0)), ((,)` <(1st ` hs0),(2nd ` hs0)>), hs0 ∈(ℝ* × ℝ*))
  a1i(hs0 ∈(ℝ* × ℝ*), ((1st ` hs0)[(,)](2nd ` hs0))=((,)` <(1st ` hs0),(2nd ` hs0)>))
  df-ov((1st ` hs0), cioo, (2nd ` hs0))
  fveq2d(cioo, <(1st ` hs0),(2nd ` hs0)>, hs0, hs0 ∈(ℝ* × ℝ*))
  eqcomd(<(1st ` hs0),(2nd ` hs0)>, hs0, hs0 ∈(ℝ* × ℝ*))
  1st2nd2(hs0, cxr, cxr)
  ioombl((1st ` hs0), (2nd ` hs0))
  ffnfv(hs0, cioo, (ℝ* × ℝ*), dom(vol))
  fco(cvol, dom(vol), (0[[,]]+∞), cioo, (ℝ* × ℝ*))
  diff.hs0.c(cioo)
  diff.hs0.c((ℝ* × ℝ*))
  diff.hs0.c(dom(vol))
}

blocks.name: ovolsplit
blocks.content: The Lebesgue outer measure function is finitely sub-additive: application to a set split in two parts, using addition for extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm ovolsplit(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(covol, c0), cle, co(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
} = {
  eqbrtrd(cfv(covol, c0), cle, co(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1))), cfv(covol, cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1))), w0)
  fveq2d(covol, c0, cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c0, cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1))))
  eqcomi(c0, cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1)))
  inundif(c0, c1)
  pm2.61dan(w0, wbr(cfv(covol, cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1))), cle, co(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)))), wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf))
  breqtrd(cfv(covol, cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1))), cle, co(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1))), cpnf, wa(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf), wbr(cfv(covol, cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1))), cle, cpnf))
  eqtr2d(cpnf, co(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1))), co(cpnf, cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1))), wa(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf)))
  adantl(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf), wceq(co(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1))), co(cpnf, cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)))))
  oveq1(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf, cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf)), wceq(co(cpnf, cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1))), cpnf), wcel(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cxr), wne(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cmnf))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf), wcel(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cxr))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cxr), wss(cdif(c0, c1), cr))
  ovolcl(cdif(c0, c1))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf), wne(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cmnf))
  xrge0nemnfd(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), w0)
  xaddpnf2(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wn(wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf))), wbr(cfv(covol, cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1))), cle, co(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)))), w0, wcel(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cr))
  simpl(w0, wn(wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wn(wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf))), wcel(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf))
  adantr(w0, wn(wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf)), wcel(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  adantl(w0, wn(wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf)), wne(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf))
  neqne(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cpnf)
  ge0xrre(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)))
  pm2.61dan(wa(w0, wcel(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cr)), wbr(cfv(covol, cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1))), cle, co(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)))), wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cpnf))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cpnf), wbr(cfv(covol, cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1))), cle, co(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)))))
  breqtrd(cfv(covol, cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1))), cle, co(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1))), cpnf, wa(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cpnf)))

  oveq2(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cpnf, cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cxad)

  sselpwd(cin(c0, c1), cr, universe, w0)
  ffvelrni(cin(c0, c1), cpw(cr), covol, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  xaddpnf1(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cr)), wn(wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cpnf))), wbr(cfv(covol, cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1))), cle, co(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)))), w0, wcel(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cr))
  simpll(w0, wcel(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cr), wn(wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cpnf)))
  simplr(w0, wcel(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cr), wn(wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cpnf)))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cfv(covol, cin(c0, c1)), cr), wn(wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cpnf)), wcel(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cr))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wn(wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cpnf))), wcel(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), cpnf))

  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(covol, cdif(c0, c1)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cdif(c0, c1), cpw(cr)))
  mpbird(w0, wcel(cdif(c0, c1), cpw(cr)), wss(cdif(c0, c1), cr))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cdif(c0, c1), cpw(cr)), wss(cdif(c0, c1), cr)), wcel(cdif(c0, c1), universe))

blocks.name: fvvolioof
blocks.content: The function value of the Lebesgue measure of an open interval composed with a function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvvolioof(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ccom(ccom(cvol, cioo), c0), c1), cfv(cvol, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cioo, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(ccom(ccom(cvol, cioo), c0), c1), cfv(cvol, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cioo, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)))), cfv(ccom(cvol, cioo), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(cvol, cfv(cioo, cfv(c0, c1))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(ccom(ccom(cvol, cioo), c0), c1), cfv(ccom(cvol, cioo), cfv(c0, c1))), wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  ffund(c0, c2, cxp(cxr, cxr), w0)
  eleqtrd(c1, cdm(c0), c2, w0)
  eqcomd(c2, cdm(c0), w0)
  fdmd(c0, c2, cxp(cxr, cxr), w0)
  fvco(c0, c1, ccom(cvol, cioo))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(ccom(cvol, cioo), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(cvol, cfv(cioo, cfv(c0, c1)))), wfun(cioo), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(cioo)))
  a1i(w0, wfun(cioo))
  ax-mp(wfun(cioo), wf(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cr)))
  ffun(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cr))
  syl6eleqr(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(cioo), cxp(cxr, cxr), w0)
  fdmi(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cr))
  ioof()
  fvco(cioo, cfv(c0, c1), cvol)
  fveq2d(cvol, cfv(cioo, cfv(c0, c1)), co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cioo, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), w0)
  eqtr2d(cfv(cioo, cfv(c0, c1)), co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cioo, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), cfv(cioo, cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cioo, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), cfv(cioo, cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))))))
  df-ov(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cioo, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)))
  fveq2d(cioo, cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), cfv(c0, c1), w0)
  eqcomd(cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), cfv(c0, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  ffvelrnd(c0, c1, cxp(cxr, cxr), c2, w0)
  1st2nd2(cfv(c0, c1), cxr, cxr)
}

blocks.name: volioore
blocks.content: The measure of an open interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm volioore(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(cfv(cvol, co(c0, cioo, c1)), cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(cfv(cvol, co(c0, cioo, c1)), cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cvol, co(c0, cioo, c1)), cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wceq(cfv(cvol, co(c0, cioo, c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)))
  volioo(c0, c1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wceq(cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)))
  iftrue(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wceq(cfv(cvol, co(c0, cioo, c1)), cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  simpl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wb(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cvol, co(c0, cioo, c1)), cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cfv(cvol, emptycls), nat0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wceq(cfv(cvol, emptycls), nat0))
  vol0()
  fveq2d(cvol, co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  ltled(c1, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wcel(c1, cr))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wcel(c0, cr))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wb(wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexrd(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  rexrd(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  ioo0(c0, c1)
  iffalsed(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  biimpa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  ltnled(c1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
}

blocks.name: fvvolicof
blocks.content: The function value of the Lebesgue measure of a left-closed right-open interval composed with a function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvvolicof(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), c1), cfv(cvol, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cico, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), c1), cfv(cvol, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cico, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)))), cfv(ccom(cvol, cico), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(cvol, cfv(cico, cfv(c0, c1))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), c1), cfv(ccom(cvol, cico), cfv(c0, c1))), wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  ffund(c0, c2, cxp(cxr, cxr), w0)
  eleqtrd(c1, cdm(c0), c2, w0)
  eqcomd(c2, cdm(c0), w0)
  fdmd(c0, c2, cxp(cxr, cxr), w0)
  fvco(c0, c1, ccom(cvol, cico))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(ccom(cvol, cico), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(cvol, cfv(cico, cfv(c0, c1)))), wfun(cico), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(cico)))
  a1i(w0, wfun(cico))
  ax-mp(wfun(cico), wf(cico, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)))
  ffun(cico, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
  syl6eleqr(cfv(c0, c1), cdm(cico), cxp(cxr, cxr), w0)
  fdmi(cico, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
  icof()
  fvco(cico, cfv(c0, c1), cvol)
  fveq2d(cvol, cfv(cico, cfv(c0, c1)), co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cico, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), w0)
  eqtr2d(cfv(cico, cfv(c0, c1)), co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cico, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), cfv(cico, cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cico, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), cfv(cico, cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))))))
  df-ov(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cico, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)))
  fveq2d(cico, cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), cfv(c0, c1), w0)
  eqcomd(cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), cfv(c0, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  ffvelrnd(c0, c1, cxp(cxr, cxr), c2, w0)
  1st2nd2(cfv(c0, c1), cxr, cxr)
}

blocks.name: voliooico
blocks.content: An open interval and a left-closed, right-open interval with the same real bounds, have the same Lebesgue measure. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm voliooico(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvol, co(c0, cioo, c1)), cfv(cvol, co(c0, cico, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wceq(cfv(cvol, co(c0, cioo, c1)), cfv(cvol, co(c0, cico, c1))), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cvol, co(c0, cioo, c1)), cfv(cvol, co(c0, cico, c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0), cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  eqcomd(co(c1, cmin, c0), cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  pm2.61dan(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  adantl(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)))
  iftrue(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  3eqtr4d(cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, co(c1, cmin, c1), wa(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wceq(nat0, co(c1, cmin, c1)))
  eqcomd(nat0, co(c1, cmin, c1), w0)
  subidd(c1, w0)
  recnd(c1, w0)

thm volioofmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

  syl2anc(w0, wf(ccom(ccom(cvol, cioo), c0), c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(ccom(cvol, cioo), cxp(cxr, cxr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(c0, c1, cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  a1i(w0, wf(ccom(cvol, cioo), cxp(cxr, cxr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  volioof()
  fco(ccom(cvol, cioo), cxp(cxr, cxr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c0, c1)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c1, cfv(ccom(ccom(cvol, cioo), c0), cv(s0)), cfv(cvol, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cioo, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), w0)
  fvvolioof(c0, cv(s0), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))

thm volicoff(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

  syl(w0, wf(ccom(cico, c0), c1, crn(ccom(cico, c0))), wf(ccom(cico, c0), c1, cpw(cxr)))
  fcoss(cico, c0, c1, cpw(cxr), cxp(cxr, cxr), cxp(cr, cxr), w0)
  a1i(w0, wf(cico, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)))

  feq1i(ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), ccom(cvol, ccom(cico, c0)))

blocks.name: voliooicof
blocks.content: The Lebesgue measure of open intervals is the same as the Lebesgue measure of left-closed right-open intervals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm voliooicof(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(ccom(cvol, cioo), c0), ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cxp(cr, cr)))
} = {
  eqfnfvd(hs0, ccom(ccom(cvol, cioo), c0), ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), c1, w0)
  ffnd(ccom(ccom(cvol, cioo), c0), c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  fcoss(ccom(cvol, cioo), c0, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cxp(cxr, cxr), cxp(cr, cr), w0)
  a1i(w0, wf(ccom(cvol, cioo), cxp(cxr, cxr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  volioof()
  ffnd(ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  mpbird(w0, wf(ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(ccom(cvol, ccom(cico, c0)), c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  syl2anc(w0, wf(ccom(cvol, ccom(cico, c0)), c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(cvol, cdm(cvol), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(ccom(cico, c0), c1, cdm(cvol)))
  a1i(w0, wf(cvol, cdm(cvol), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  volf()
  sylibr(w0, wf(ccom(cico, c0), c1, cdm(cvol)), wa(wfn(ccom(cico, c0), c1), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cfv(ccom(cico, c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol)))))
  jca(w0, wfn(ccom(cico, c0), c1), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cfv(ccom(cico, c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol))))
  ffnd(ccom(cico, c0), c1, cpw(cxr), w0)
  fcoss(cico, c0, c1, cpw(cxr), cxp(cxr, cxr), cxp(cr, cr), w0)
  a1i(w0, wf(cico, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)))
  icof()
  ralrimiva(hs0, c1, w0, wcel(cfv(ccom(cico, c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol)))
  eqeltrd(cfv(ccom(cico, c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol), co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cico, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  fvovco(cico, c0, cv(hs0), c1, cr, cr, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wf(c0, c1, cxp(cr, cr)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cico, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cr), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cxr))
  rexrd(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  icombl(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))
  ffnfv(hs0, ccom(cico, c0), c1, cdm(cvol))
  fco(cvol, cdm(cvol), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), ccom(cico, c0), c1)
  feq1d(ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), ccom(cvol, ccom(cico, c0)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), ccom(cvol, ccom(cico, c0))))

  3eqtr4d(cfv(ccom(ccom(cvol, cioo), c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cvol, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cioo, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), cfv(cvol, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cico, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  voliooico(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cxp(cr, cr)))
  xp1st(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cr, cr)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cxp(cr, cr)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cxp(cr, cr), w0)
  xp2nd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cr, cr)
  fvvolioof(c0, cv(hs0), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))

blocks.name: volicofmpt
blocks.content: ` ( ( vol o. [,) ) o. F ) ` expressed in maps-to notation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm volicofmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(cvol, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cico, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cxp(cr, cxr)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(cvol, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cico, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), cv(s0))), w0)
  feqmptdf(s0, ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  nfco(s0, ccom(cvol, cico), c0)
  nfcv(s0, ccom(cvol, cico))
  volicoff(c0, c1, w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c1, cfv(ccom(ccom(cvol, cico), c0), cv(s0)), cfv(cvol, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cico, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), w0)
  fvvolicof(c0, cv(s0), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wf(c0, c1, cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  fssd(c0, c1, cxp(cxr, cxr), cxp(cr, cxr), w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(cxp(cr, cxr), cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  ax-mp(wss(cxp(cr, cxr), cxp(cxr, cxr)), wss(cr, cxr))
  ressxr()
  xpss1(cr, cxr, cxr)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  diff.ccom.s(s0, cvol, cico)
  diff.cvol.s(s0)
  diff.cico.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm volicofmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((vol ∘[,))∘ c0)=(s0 ∈ c1 ↦(vol `((1st `(c0 ` s0))[[,)](2nd `(c0 ` s0))))))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c1 →(ℝ × ℝ*)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(((vol ∘[,))∘ c0), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(vol `((1st `(c0 ` s0))[[,)](2nd `(c0 ` s0))))), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(((vol ∘[,))∘ c0)` s0)), w0)
  feqmptdf(s0, ((vol ∘[,))∘ c0), c1, (0[[,]]+∞), w0)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  nfco(s0, (vol ∘[,)), c0)
  nfcv(s0, (vol ∘[,)))
  volicoff(c0, c1, w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c1, (((vol ∘[,))∘ c0)` s0), (vol `((1st `(c0 ` s0))[[,)](2nd `(c0 ` s0)))), w0)
  fvvolicof(c0, s0, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, (c0 : c1 →(ℝ* × ℝ*)))
  fssd(c0, c1, (ℝ* × ℝ*), (ℝ × ℝ*), w0)
  a1i(w0, (ℝ × ℝ*)⊆(ℝ* × ℝ*))
  ax-mp((ℝ × ℝ*)⊆(ℝ* × ℝ*), ℝ ⊆ ℝ*)
  ressxr()
  xpss1(cr, cxr, cxr)
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ c1)
  diff.ccom.s(s0, cvol, cico)
  diff.cvol.s(s0)
  diff.cico.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: voliccico
blocks.content: A closed interval and a left-closed, right-open interval with the same real bounds, have the same Lebesgue measure. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm voliccico(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvol, co(c0, cicc, c1)), cfv(cvol, co(c0, cico, c1))))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
} = {

  eqcomd(co(c1, cmin, c0), cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  pm2.61dan(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  adantl(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)))
  iftrue(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  3eqtr4d(cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, co(c1, cmin, c1), wa(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wceq(nat0, co(c1, cmin, c1)))
  eqcomd(nat0, co(c1, cmin, c1), w0)
  subidd(c1, w0)
  recnd(c1, w0)
  adantl(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wceq(cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)), nat0))
  iffalse(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wceq(co(c1, cmin, c0), co(c1, cmin, c1)), w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  lenlteq(c0, c1, wa(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wcel(c0, cr), w0)
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wcel(c1, cr), w0)
  simpll(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  adantr(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  simpr(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  adantl(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(c1, cmin, c0), co(c1, cmin, c1)))
  oveq2(c0, c1, c1, cmin)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(cfv(cvol, co(c0, cicc, c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(c0, cr))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(c1, cr))
  simpr(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  volicc(c0, c1)
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wceq(cfv(cvol, co(c0, cico, c1)), cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(cvol, co(c0, cico, c1)), cif(co(c1, cmin, c0), nat0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  volico(c0, c1)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wceq(cfv(cvol, co(c0, cicc, c1)), cfv(cvol, co(c0, cico, c1))), w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  simpr(w0, wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)))

  eqtr4d(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cico, c1), emptycls, wa(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cicc, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0), wb(wceq(co(c0, cicc, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cicc, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexrd(c0, w0)
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  icc0(c0, c1)
  mpbird(wa(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cico, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  ltled(c1, c0, wa(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  simpr(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cico, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
